channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SpaceX launches daredevil billionaire into space to conduct first spacewalk by a private citizen
item.description: Entrepreneur Jared Isaacman and SpaceX shared the cost, which included developing and testing new spacesuits to see how they hold up in the harsh vacu...

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Tesla a top pick, Costco gets a downgrade
item.description: An electric vehicle maker and a wholesale retailer were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Top EU court says Apple owes €13 billion in back taxes
Boeing union members angry over size of negotiated 25% raise may sink tentative contract deal
item.description: Leaflets distributed around Boeing’s Everett factory urged workers to reject “Boeing’s Bad Deal” and demanded the union fight for a 40% wage increase,...

item.title: SpaceX launches Polaris Dawn mission, which will attempt the first private spacewalk
item.description: It's the first of three missions that billionaire Jared Isaacman purchased from SpaceX in 2022 for his human spaceflight effort known as the Polaris P...

item.title: The ‘great wait’ economy is here, and it’s confusing investors
U.K. may need to tax the wealthy or target inheritances to close £20 billion deficit left by previous government
item.description: Reeves hands are tied by Labour manifesto promises not to raise a number of big revenue-raising taxes, including income tax and VAT.

item.title: AstraZeneca shares fall 5% on disappointing lung cancer drug trial results
item.description: AstraZeneca shares fell more than 5% Tuesday morning, the biggest one-day drop in seven months, after the British pharmaceutical giant announced disap...

item.title: Opinion: Apple investors get raw deal with iPhone 16, but customers get bargain
Apple iPhone 16 gets game-changing camera button and AI-powered visual intelligence
item.description: The iPhone 16 “has been designed for Apple Intelligence from the ground up,” CEO Tim Cook said during Monday's event.

item.title: Google's 2.4 billion euro fine upheld by Europe's top court in EU antitrust probe
item.description: The fine stems from an antitrust investigation by European Union regulators into Google that concluded in 2017.

item.title: Why low gas prices shouldn’t be a ‘bragging point’ in presidential elections
The future is charging at us—and humanity must cope with what was once the stuff of science fiction
item.description: The costs of the shiny convenience that dangles from a convergence of AI, robotics, and the Internet of Things may be higher than we can readily fores...

item.title: Apple must pay 13 billion euros in back taxes, EU's top court rules
item.description: Europe's top court on Tuesday ruled against Apple in the tech giant's 10-year court battle over its tax affairs in Ireland.

item.title: GameStop is ‘still a squeezable stock,’ could be poised for rally after earnings
